import { Modal, useMantineTheme } from '@mantine/core'; function ProfileModal({modalOpened, setModalOpened, data}) { const theme = useMantineTheme(); const { password, ...other } = data; const [formData, setFormData] = useState(other); const [profileImage, setProfileImage] = useState(null); const [coverImage, setCoverImage] = useState(null); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const param = useParams(); const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.authReducer.authData); return ( setModalOpened(false)} > {/* Modal content */}
